ack.p: This research is part of an international project entitled ‘Research on Arbovirus Dynamics and Mitigation–Latin America and Canada’ (RADAM-LAC), with field study sites in Colombia, Ecuador and Argentina. The RADAM-LAC Research Team consists of Beate Sander, Camila González, Jianhong Wu, Manisha A. Kulkarni, Marcos Miretti, Mauricio Espinel and Varsovia Cevallos.
